title: Severe mpox in an immunocompromised patient complicated by deep tissue infection: A case report
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Susanne Pfefferle, Michaela Schweizer, Kristin Hartmann, Julia Berger, Dominik Nörz, Petra Emmerich, Ronald von Possel, Katja Giersch, Lisa Sophie Pflüger, Christian Bernreuther, Markus Glatzel, Susanne Krasemann, Thomas Theo Brehm, Julian Schulze zur Wisch, Nicole Fischer, Stefan Schmiedel, Martin Aepfelbacher, Marc Lütgehetmann
